metadata.name: Behind every cry is a story
metadata.description:
* Sometimes we only hear a cry without knowing who it is for, we only see tears without knowing what they are for, we see crumpled handkerchiefs without knowing the reason for their use.
It is enough to see better or hear carefully, these tears are valuable; With each drop of tears, a part of a story is written on a napkin, each one can show us the pages of a drama novel or the plans of a tragic movie, but we don't hesitate to pass them by.

** For this animation, the designs were made on 70 sheets of tissue paper.

size: 720*1280
length: 60 sec
format: MP4
